channel.title: AI on ExitCode0
channel.description: Recent content in AI on ExitCode0

item.title: Testing Llama3 With LM Studio
item.description: Taking a look at the the latest open source llama 3 model after its April 2024 release. Testing its performance and accuracy with LM Studio.

item.title: Generating Artwork With Stable Diffusion - April 2024 Edition
item.description: A look at the state of artwork generation with stable-diffusion in April 2024. Investigating if (local) stable-diffusion can reliably produce enjoyable artwork.
